trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_SEQ_00<tab>Melkoko would like to share with you the outcome of Rhoswen's plot.

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_SEQ_01<tab>Having informed you of Rhoswen's failed attempt to entrap Carvallain, Melkoko remembers that Lyngsath has been looking for you. Hurry over to the Bismarck and ask the guildmaster what he requires of you.

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_SEQ_02<tab>Lyngsath informs you that Master Dellemont, founder and judge of the contest of his namesake, is due at the Bismarck to inspect the venue. With his hands full preparing for the visit, Lyngsath needs you to cook for an old friend in his stead. The friend, an elderly retired pirate, is fond of meat, but no longer has the teeth with which to masticate it. To this end, Lyngsath bids you prepare for him a dish that is at once meaty and tender─cockatrice meatballs.

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_SEQ_03<tab>No sooner do you present the cockatrice meatballs to Lyngsath than Master Dellemont arrives at the Bismarck. He waits patiently as the guildmaster serves his old friend, who devours his meal with relish and leaves with a smile on his face. Shortly thereafter, H'mhasi Tia and Melkoko come to pay their respects to Master Dellemont, but an argument breaks out between them which culminates in an unexpected wager. Though she has absolutely no business doing so, Melkoko agrees to relinquish ownership of the Bismarck to H'mhasi Tia should he emerge triumphant in the Dellemont d'Or. Should he lose to you, however, he must give up his calling. The stakes have become exceedingly high; see to it that you are fully prepared for the contest─for Lyngsath's sake, if no one else's.
※The next culinarian quest will be available from Melkoko upon reaching level 60.
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Lyngsath.

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a serving of cockatrice meatballs <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Deliver the cockatrice meatballs <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Lyngsath)) /var>.

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_MELKOKO_000_000<tab>Doubtless you're wondering what became of Captain Rhoswen's plot. Well, shortly after you left, she invited Carvallain to her ship for dinner. Alas, he was suspicious of her intent from the first, and refused to put anything in his mouth. He just sat there, poking and prodding his meal...
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_MELKOKO_000_001<tab>Gah, what a bloody waste! Fer all 'er talk of offin' 'im, it wasn't a trap at all! <sigh> If only she weren't so godsdamned proud an' stubborn...

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_MELKOKO_000_002<tab>And that's the only news I have to share. ...Ah, right! Lyngsath was looking for you. He seemed to be in a spot of bother, so you had best go and see what's afoot.
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_MELKOKO_000_005<tab>Lyngsath was looking for you. He seemed to be in a spot of bother, so you had best go and see what's afoot.
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_LYNGSATH_000_010<tab>Thanks fer comin', <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I realize yer busy preparin' fer the contest an' all, but I needs yer 'elp with somethin'.

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_LYNGSATH_000_011<tab>Ye see, Master Dellemont's due to come an' inspect the Bismarck. I don't doubt ye see the connection, but 'e's the founder o' the contest an' a livin' legend o' cookin'. But most importantly fer you, 'e's also the judge.

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_LYNGSATH_000_012<tab>Anyroad, I've got me 'ands full tryin' to sort the place out afore Master Dellemont arrives. Thing is, an old friend o' mine's comin' to dine any moment now, but I can't peel meself away from me work long enough to look after 'im. I'd be obliged if ye could prepare 'is meal in me stead.
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_LYNGSATH_000_013<tab>The man's loved meat since 'e was a young pirate, but age 'as taken its toll, an' 'e's got 'ardly any teeth left.

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_LYNGSATH_000_014<tab>That bein' the case, I wants ye to cook 'im something what's meaty but tender. A nice servin' o' cockatrice meatballs, say. Thanks in advance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_LYNGSATH_000_030<tab>'Ow's the cockatrice meatballs comin' along? Me friend will be 'ere any moment now.
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_LYNGSATH_100_030<tab>Welcome to the Bismarck, Master Dellemont! We're honored by yer visit!

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_DELLEMMONT_000_032<tab>You must be Lyngsath's foremost student. Aye, I have heard much and more about your exploits. But you are in the midst of serving a customer─pray do not mind me.
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_LYNGSATH_000_033<tab>So, 'ow do ye like it, old friend?

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_GOINKYO02046_000_034<tab>It'sh sho tender it crumblesh in my mouth, but it'sh shtill everything I love about meat─the tashte, the tekshure, the juishinesh! That'sh to shay...I love it!
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_LYNGSATH_000_036<tab>'E was the captain of 'is own ship back in the day. Was strong as an ox, too.

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_LYNGSATH_000_037<tab>But age robbed 'im of 'is strength, along with most of 'is teeth, an' 'e couldn't eat all the stuff 'e loved no more. Seein' 'im 'appy like that, it brings a tear to me eye. Thank ye, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_DELLEMMONT_000_039<tab>I am pleased to see that all is smooth sailing at the Bismarck.
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_HMHASITIA_000_040<tab>Master Dellemont, it has been a while. I was told that you would be visiting this day, and I wished to pay my respects.
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_DELLEMMONT_000_041<tab>Ah, if it isn't the reigning champion. You surpassed all expectations last time, and I fully expect that you will do so again.
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_MELKOKO_000_043<tab>Hmph, who do you think you're fooling with that false modesty?
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_HMHASITIA_000_044<tab>You're participating in the Dellemont d'Or, too, yes? Do yourself a favor: don't bother preparing a speech. You won't get the chance to use it.

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_MELKOKO_000_047<tab>Why, you arrogant...! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s the guild's best culinarian, I'll 'ave ye know! Ye've got nothin' on <var 08 E905 (('er)) (('im)) /var>!

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_HMHASITIA_000_048<tab>So, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> competes for the honor of the guild. That's all well and good, but how about we compete for something more...tangible? This restaurant, for instance?
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_MELKOKO_000_049<tab>Done! But if you lose, ye've got to swear to give up bein' a culinarian!
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_HMHASITIA_000_050<tab>Master Dellemont, may we ask you to stand as witness to this agreement?
TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_DELLEMMONT_000_051<tab>A restaurant and a calling─such high stakes will serve to liven up the contest! I look forward to seeing how this will unfold!

TEXT_CLSCUL580_02046_LYNGSATH_000_058<tab>I...I didn't just imagine that, did I? Melkoko wagerin' the Bismarck on yer winnin' the Dellemont d'Or? Not to say that I don't believe in ye, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((son)) /var>...but this place ain't 'ers to wager! Arrrgh, gods-bloody-dammit!
